name: pnp-sp-fx-aces-chartcard-threeseries
title: Chart Card with Three Series
shortDescription: Baseline example of the chart card rendering options which was introduced as part of the SPFx 1.19 release.
longDescription: Baseline example of the chart card rendering options which was introduced as part of the SPFx 1.19 release.
Chart card can be used to render simple charts directly in the card view, so that you can include graphical details on your business situation directly in the Viva Connections dashboard.

thumbnails.alt: Preview of medium and larger rendering

references.name: Viva Connections Extensibility guidance
references.description: Adaptive Card Extensions are client-side components that run in the context of a SharePoint page.
